skillTree.name: Cinderbreath
skillTree.description: This mighty Bale Taurus carries the dread Sorcerer Drazhoath the Ashen, Lord of the Black Fortress, to battle, at the head of his twisted Legion of Azgorh, to bring fire and Ruin down upon the foe.

skillTree.name: Unyielding Command
skillTree.description: With a leader this cruel, is it any surprise that his troops are obedient and loyal to the end? Fear is the most effective motivator.

skillTree.name: Hashut's Scales
skillTree.description: The Father of Darkness protects his children from sorcery through a variety of magical means, all of them twisted and obscure.

skillTree.name: Headdress of Zharr
skillTree.description: Having a thing for hats can be most useful when everyone keeps aiming at your headâ€¦

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Towering Heights
skillTree.description: "Walls? I see only piles of sand crafted by children. Bring my brothers close enough and we shall take pleasure in fulfilling our bargain and topple them for you!"

effects.description:
Construction time: -1 for all buildings (minimum of 1 turn)
	(local province)

Construction cost: -15% for all buildings
	(local province)

skillTree.name: We Are Legion
skillTree.description: Almost killing as one, horrendous violence clearly runs in their blood.

effects.description: Armament cost: -25% for increasing capacity of Infernal Guard and Infernal Ironsworn units

Upkeep: -15% for Infernal Guard and Infernal Ironsworn units
	(Lord's army)

Bonus vs infantry: +15 for Infernal Guard and Infernal Ironsworn units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Greed of Azgorh
skillTree.description: Truly their greed knows no bounds, as they strip the dead of every last scrap of dignity.

skillTree.name: Master of Hell
skillTree.description: A minor Daemonsmith no longer, Drazhoath has raised himself to greatness in his chosen field: to create the K'daai, half-raging fire, half-Daemon essence â€“ all mindless destructive force.

effects.description: Armament cost: -25% for increasing capacity of K'daai units

Weapon strength: +15% for K'daai units
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 15% for all K'daai units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ashen
skillTree.description: The cinders and clinker from the grate beneath his sacrificial altar both heal Drazhoath and ward against magic.

skillTree.name: Long Years of Exile
skillTree.description: High up in the turrets of the Black Fortress, Drazhoath has waited, developing his sorcerous skills and biding his time.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -6 for "Flames of Azgorh"
Winds of Magic cost: -9 for "Flames of Azgorh Upgraded"

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Burning Wrath"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Burning Wrath Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Burning Wrath Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Dark Subjugation"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Dark Subjugation Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Dark Subjugation Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Ash Storm"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Ash Storm Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Ash Storm Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Curse of Hashut"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Curse of Hashut Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Curse of Hashut Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Hell Hammer"
Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Hell Hammer Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Hell Hammer Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Flames of Azgorh"
Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Flames of Azgorh Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Flames of Azgorh Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Survivalist
skillTree.description: "The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud â€“ these are the things that sustain me."

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Fervent Fodder
skillTree.description: Though they face almost-certain death at the enemy's hands, that has to be better than what the Chaos Dwarfs have in store for their Greenskin underlings, right? Some even welcome such an end.

effects.description:
Leadership: +2 for Labourers, Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders Melee units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +4 for Labourers, Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders Melee units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +3 for Labourers, Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders Melee units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 for Labourers, Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders Melee units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Labourers, Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders Melee units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Blackshard Bulwark
skillTree.description: Wearing ultra-resilient armour forged with blood and hellfire, the Chaos Dwarfs present a  mighty defensive wall, stronger even than steel, to their incautious, overconfident enemies.

effects.description:
Armour: +4 for Chaos Dwarf Melee Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +8 for Chaos Dwarf Melee Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +3 for Chaos Dwarf Melee Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for Chaos Dwarf Melee Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Chaos Dwarf Melee Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Firing Drills
skillTree.description: Drilling loading, shooting and reloading, until they become second nature, so the foe is under constant barrage, is surely the way to victory.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +4% for Hobgoblin Archers, Chaos Dwarf Blunderbusses, Infernal Guard (Fireglaives) and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders (Bows) units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Hobgoblin Archers, Chaos Dwarf Blunderbusses, Infernal Guard (Fireglaives) and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders (Bows) units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Hobgoblin Archers, Chaos Dwarf Blunderbusses, Infernal Guard (Fireglaives) and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders (Bows) units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Hobgoblin Archers, Chaos Dwarf Blunderbusses, Infernal Guard (Fireglaives) and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders (Bows) units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for Hobgoblin Archers, Chaos Dwarf Blunderbusses, Infernal Guard (Fireglaives) and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders (Bows) units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hellforged Ordnance
skillTree.description: Beneath their mutated faces and ever-darkened souls, the Chaos Dwarfs are still Dwarfs at heart, retaining all of their counterparts' metalworking skill and knack for ingenious engineering solutions.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +6% for Iron Daemon and Artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +12% for Iron Daemon and Artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Range: +5% for Iron Daemon and Artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Iron Daemon and Artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Range: +10% for Iron Daemon and Artillery units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Crushing Charge
skillTree.description: Assuming you can't avoid the confrontation altogether, the most sensible course of action is to get well out of the way!

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +4% for Bull Centaur Renders units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +8% for Bull Centaur Renders units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +4 for Bull Centaur Renders units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Bull Centaur Renders units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Bull Centaur Renders units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hellish Blows
skillTree.description: The Daemonic fire-elementals and various other monstrous creatures in the Chaos Dwarfs' service are fielded to crack the skulls and crush the souls of those who dare stand against them.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +4% for Great Taurus, Lammasu, Bale Taurus, K'daai and Skullcracker units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +3 for Great Taurus, Lammasu, Bale Taurus, K'daai and Skullcracker units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +8% for Great Taurus, Lammasu, Bale Taurus, K'daai and Skullcracker units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Great Taurus, Lammasu, Bale Taurus, K'daai and Skullcracker units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Great Taurus, Lammasu, Bale Taurus, K'daai and Skullcracker units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Lucky Lackeys
skillTree.description: Even though they're considered little more than a raw resource by their evil masters, some Greenskins avoid being worked to death by "assisting" their keepers on the field of battle.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Labourers, Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Labourers, Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for Hobgoblins  and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 10% for Labourers, Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Marshalled Military
skillTree.description: To be this effective in battle takes not just suicidal levels of courage and determination, but the discipline to hold the line and, as one, take the fight directly into the enemy's wavering hearts.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Chaos Dwarf Melee Infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Chaos Dwarf melee infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for Chaos Dwarf Melee Infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Bloodied Bombardment
skillTree.description: From the barrels of the Chaos Dwarfs' infernal war machines are fired shrieking rockets and blasts of raw, Ruinous magick, leaving those not instantly turned to liquid quaking and gibbering in their wake.

effects.description:
Explosive Missile Damage: +12% for Iron Daemon and Artillery units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for Iron Daemon, Artillery, Chaos Dwarf Blunderbusses and Infernal Guard (Fireglaives) units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Iron Daemon and Artillery, Chaos Dwarf Blunderbusses and Infernal Guard (Fireglaives) units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Iron Daemon and Artillery, Chaos Dwarf Blunderbusses and Infernal Guard (Fireglaives) units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Wretched Warhost
skillTree.description: Those twisted, hellishly-mutated monsters in the service of the Chaos Dwarfs are some of their most effective weapons, particularly when organised into a malign host of Ruinous shock troops.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +12% for Bull Centaur Renders, Great Taurus, Lammasu, Bale Taurus, K'daai and Skullcracker units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Bull Centaur Renders, Great Taurus, Lammasu, Bale Taurus, K'daai and Skullcracker units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Bull Centaur Renders, Great Taurus, Lammasu, Bale Taurus, K'daai and Skullcracker units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Cunning
skillTree.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +20%

skillTree.name: Logistician
skillTree.description: Proficient with figures, this Lord, or his subordinates, can keep his army fulfilled, even in dire circumstances.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ruthless Disciplinarian
skillTree.description: Beatings WILL continue until morale improves, or even if it does...

skillTree.name: Tyrant
skillTree.description: Some conquerors are mild and fair. Not so this one, whose savagery and corruption truly know no bounds.

skillTree.name: Iron-Willed
skillTree.description: A Dawi-Zharr such as he does not care for being wounded â€“ by his will alone he continues to fight.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Alert
skillTree.description: Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

effects.description: Evasion chance when using the Underway: +10%
Evasion chance when using the Underway: +20%

skillTree.name: Despoilers
skillTree.description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them â€“ this is what Chaos wants.

skillTree.name: Serve or Die
skillTree.description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die. There is no other option."

skillTree.name: Unbridled Cruelty
skillTree.description: Brutality or viciousness don't go anywhere near far enough. Even barbarism is too mild a term.

backgroundSkills.name: Tyrant of the Black Tower
backgroundSkills.description: In a society where the most heinous acts of cruelty are applauded â€“ nay, *rewarded* â€“ his atrocious tyranny is actually considered to be a positive thing.

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target

items.name: The Graven Sceptre
items.description: A badge of rank and high office, this iron staff-mace, which carries the runic names of every past master of the Black Fortress, is bound with baleful prayers to Hashut.

ui_effects.description: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

effects.description: Targeting range: +10% for Lore of Hashut spells

items.name: Daemonspite Crucible
items.description: Forged from meteoric iron and blighted gold, quenched in innocentÂ blood and bound with slain, hell-bound souls, theÂ Crucible is said to have been the handiwork of the ancientÂ Chaos Dwarf Sorcerer Azgorh himself.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

items.name: Hellshard Amulet
items.description: The icy hate of Drazhoath's malice is amplified a thousandfold within its black crystal depths, and unleashed on any who would dare spill his blood.

factionEffects.title: Sentinel of Ashes
factionEffects.description: Exiled from Zharr-Naggrund by Lord Astragoth, after his political intrigues failed, to the forbidding Black Fortress, Drazhoath has been plotting his return â€“ and his revenge â€“ for many long centuries.

effects.description: Armaments cost: -10% for all unit capacity upgrades in the Hell-Forge
Siege towers: +2 per siege item constructed
